website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a wheeled car seat bag, this one boasts effortless rolling, thanks to its 360-degree spinner wheels.
pros: Easy, multi-directional upright rolling without needing to tilt
Fully padded on sides, top, and back
Full access front opening with dual, lockable zipper
cons: Does not fit Recaro Rally or Racer
If you are traveling with an infant seat, detach the base and place it on top of the car seat inside the bag

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Fits Graco Extend2Fit car seats. It also served as overflow storage so we wouldn't go over weight on the regular luggage. The four wheels are smooth-rolling. It even served briefly to roll the seats with the kids for a few feet (to entertain the tired kids).
customer_reviews.author: R. Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Finally a good car seat bag!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two other car seat bags. Both were horrible to roll and ripped after the first flight! This bag is the only one I can recommend. It wheels great and has been on three flights with rips yet! If you need a car seat bag look no further!! This is the best one out there!
customer_reviews.author: sjooste

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for traveling with car seat.
customer_reviews.text: I was going back and forth trying to see if we really need this for our trip and I’m soo so happy I bought this! Took it for my babe’s first flight and it’s so easy to roll around. I got a couple moms and dads asking me what brand it is. It fits our graco 4-in-1 perfectly with a ton of room for a small pack of diapers and wipes and even some of her fave toys as extra luggage space. Even the guy that did the gate check appreciates this. He said it was easy to maneuver and the handle helps. It stores almost flat and will definitely be bringing this with us on all trips!
customer_reviews.author: Xutzen

customer_reviews.title: 4 wheels make the difference!
customer_reviews.text: This fit both the Chico MyFit and Britax Advocate car seats. The four wheels are a lifesaver when you have a bag, wagon and two car seats. We have the two wheeled bag and it takes some finagling to get it to roll right but this one we are able to move it like a regular checked bag. I do however wish they would but a double wall of canvas on the bottom near the wheels. The baggage handlers must have not known it had four wheels and the bag ripped when it was rubbing on the concrete after one trip.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan G

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was SO convienent traveling with our toddler age sons convertible car seat. We have the Chicco Nextfit Zip convertible seat and it fit very well. We previously travelled with a borrowed backpack style, thin bag and it was horrible. My husband had to frequently stop to readjust the bag/seat and the seat is closer to 30lbs so it was not easy to carry. Having this bag on wheels is a game changer. We could easily push this through the airport and check it with our luggage. I’ve only been on two flights but it doesn’t have any damage and it kept our seat protected. When not in use it easy folds for storage. Would highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Parent LifeSaver
customer_reviews.text: This was the most well spent money for traveling ever. It maneuvers better than my more expensive luggage. We bought the four wheel version. We strapped our two year old in her seat and left the cover open and hauled her around in the airport and to the rental car. So we didn’t need a stroller. Super easy. The padding was a nice addition. I would recommend it to any parent who wants to keep their car seat clean and a little more protected for flights and easy travel. We have a Chicco nextfit zip and when it’s sitting upright in the 9 position it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: DILLON

customer_reviews.title: Life Changer
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! I embarked on a cross country trip with my 7 month old....6 different flights....by myself. If you are traveling alone with your little, this is a MUST!! Fits both infant and convertible. Literally glided through the airport, it made the car seat truly weightless. I saw other parents struggling with the cheaper models without 4 wheels...big mistake. Spend the money, you won’t regret it. You can always use it for other things in the future. Very durable and padded. Car seat not damaged in the slightest.
customer_reviews.author: Double

customer_reviews.title: Like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Way better than trying to back pack carry it through airport (our next fit is heavy). I was worried it would not work with our career but once we set it inside just right, it zipped without any issues. Protected the car seat on the 6 hour flight. We were even complimented on it by tsa. Since my toddler prefers to be in ergo, figured this would be better than try to roll her in a car seat holder through the airport.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Bag is too small for my car seats
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t fit my maxi cosi or britax car seats. At first I tried to use it on my Maxi Cosi Pria 85, but it was too small. I then tried on my Britax Advantage. Again, too small. Nice concept, but probably for smaller car seats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a single mom and my 3 year old and I just went on vacation and this bag was the best! It was so easy to push/pull, my daughter was even able to help. It was so easy to put her car seat in and just zip up. I was worried it wouldn’t fit her seat, it’s the extend 2 fit 4eve, but there was plenty of room! I’m so glad I spent the money and bought this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Just get it!
customer_reviews.text: I was living in the stone ages before I discovered things like these exist! I did extensive research for a car seat carrier and this item lives up to the rave! My family travels alot so this was definitely a lifesaver when trying to lug around a toddler, stroller, car seat, and suitcases through the airport. My little one also likes to sit on top of it as I drag it. It's sturdy and protects the car seat very well.
customer_reviews.author: Lecranium

customer_reviews.title: I was able to easily wheel around a stroller with a baby and this ...
customer_reviews.text: This fits my recaro car seat. It saved me on my flight from Texas to Spain. I was able to easily wheel around a stroller with a baby and this bag. The bag collapses easily making it easy to stow away during a flight or packing away at home. Only feedback would be to make the strap on top easier to pull. Maybe a handle bar similar to a luggage piece. It was worth every cent
customer_reviews.author: C Garza

customer_reviews.title: More of a headache than a convenience.
customer_reviews.text: Poor Quality! More of a headache than a convenience. Wheels don’t spin properly making lugging it around a hassle. Poor quality. There seems to be no thought in make this bag travel friendly. Zippers aren’t that sturdy and they’re not the type that are lockable with a lock. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BongoloB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect protection, maneuverability and durability!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this car seat travel case/bag! The wheels make it easy to maneuver in the airport and when checked, kept the car seat safe...no holes after two flights or lost wheels! It also had room to add a few other things if you wanted to add padding or other items. I got a backpack version for our second car seat so it was nice to put one on my back and push this one on it’s wheels.
customer_reviews.author: culm86

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bag, zipper quality could be much better.
customer_reviews.text: Great for transporting car seat - and addl bags depending on car seat size - via checked luggage (2 round trips so far). It would be nice if the handle area was more substantial to help with maneuvering the bag on wheels. Or perhaps a collapsible bar/handle like typical luggage. Also the zipper quality could be much better. While the bag material feels quality/durable, the zipper feels cheap and it can be difficult to operate the zipper. Vaseline or lithium grease in the zipper teeth helps.
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: Not a good investment for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to say it looks great when it arrives, however when we use it the first time, the wheels broke and also the bag ripped. This is pretty pricey. I would not buy it unless you want to be carrying your car seat the whole way to the airport.
customer_reviews.author: Shu Y Wain

customer_reviews.title: Large with extra room
customer_reviews.text: Very Large! Fits our Extend-to-Fit car seat and more. I traveled alone with my 18 month old and needed an extra hand/space, so this was great to toss in a few extra things we got on our trip. I had too many things in the diaper bag/my carry on, so I tossed some soft items in a small bag and strapped them in the carseat with the attached strap from the Travel bag (great space saver for extra diapers, clunky toys, large coats that you don't need to carry on the airplane... etc). Worked great and easy to push/pull with one had. So far it has held up great after two flights.
customer_reviews.author: CcZahzah

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for one flight, maybe 2.
customer_reviews.text: I like the wheels because it’s easy to maneuver any direction. I used for airplane travel and had a connecting flight. I made it there but on the way home it ripped pretty bad. If the material was better it would be a good product, but more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Von Ins

customer_reviews.title: Quality went down?
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time purchasing this. However this time, it came damaged where the information tag supposed to be. Very poor quality on that part. Hopefully the rest of the quality on everything else didnt go down. I havent travelled with this one yet so we will see. The first one is still good. I needed a 2nd one because I have a kids now.
customer_reviews.author: Izzybam

customer_reviews.title: Effortless in airport-so helpful!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the durability, it was not damaged at all and kept the car seat clean on the airplane. The handle is sturdy and wheels work well and truly swivel to make pulling it through airport effortless-versus carrying or lugging it around. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SAHM Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Making travel with a little just a bit easier
customer_reviews.text: This bag has been traveling with our baby a cinch! It lights to the airport with ease, we’ve gotten many compliments on how easy it is to maneuver from airport staff. It is extremely durable, and protects our valuable car seat investment. Would recommend anyone by this, it is more than worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: MRR

customer_reviews.title: Best carseat bag on the market
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. At first I had sticker shock when I bought it but it is versatile and is such a good size. It handles so easily my toddlers were able to push it around. I can not speak to how it will hold up on a flight because unfortunately we missed our flight. It fits Chicco nextfit and Graco 4ever extend2fit. It can also fit tall back booster seats.
customer_reviews.author: April Johnson

customer_reviews.title: So convenient at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This was so so convenient. To make it prefect would be to have a pull out handle. Then my son could hold on to it while he was in his stroller and I was carrying everything else. Even without that though, it made traveling pretty smooth.
customer_reviews.author: VEDGE

customer_reviews.title: Wheels are wonky
customer_reviews.text: We have this bag as well as the backpack/strapped carrier. This one is nice with the wheels but on some surfaces it goes all over the place. I really wish this one had the wheels and the option for a back pack as well. That would be the perfect bag.
customer_reviews.author: S. Story

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: Best $$ ever spent! Makes traveling so much easier! You need this is your traveling with your baby. I’ve taken this on 2 trips and so far it’s held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: joanna

customer_reviews.title: Easy travel
customer_reviews.text: Very good for travel and nice and roomy. The wheels on the bottom make this cover very easy to take through the airport which is exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: HCM

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: The old one I bought $43, it was broken at 2nd flight. This one I bought for $97. Look them just the same. First flight from NE to WA, it is still ok.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Schulte

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Wife had to go solo on a trip with the little one and this was a lifesaver. Held up just find, rolls super easy, plenty of space (Britax Marathon), could even though a few additional things inside, and overall was very pleased! I know there's a cheaper option--steered away from that one because of a few concerning reviews, but definitely didn't have any of those problems with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Ripped on the first trip!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars because I love the way it handles and generally works but it ripped on the first flight. this could of course be a challenge with airport personal getting rough with these bags but all in all you would expect it to survive a little longer? I tried to get in touch with the company that makes these but there do not seem to be contact details on Amazon - maybe they read this review and get back to me?
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Schottky

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: So worth it! It was so easy to put the car seat in this bag and tote it around the airport and to the rental car place. So nice to have four wheels and that it could stay upright. Fit our britax car seat perfectly and we were able to cram in a blanket and nippy pillow with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan DeWitt

customer_reviews.title: Durable, high quality, rolling bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for traveling through the airport. I love that it rolls with the suitcases. It’s so much easier than carrying backpack style or dragging a bag. I have checked it with the luggage 4 times and so far it only has 1 tiny hole. Lots of use left!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Lane

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The wheels in the bottom are very hard to steer, especially if traveling alone. Also, this states the bag can be used as a backpack. This is untrue. Also the bag is too small, almost too small to zip my smaller car seat in. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne T Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: This did rip slightly the first time we put our car seat in it but it still held up on the flight. It’s a dream to push around the airport with the four wheels. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Everyday Mom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver for traveling with those bulky car seats! It’s very easy to fit my Grace Extend to fit into this bag and also easy to pull while pushing my son’s stroller through an airport.
customer_reviews.author: JackieSudduth

customer_reviews.title: Nice but bulky
customer_reviews.text: I would normally give this a 5 it’s kind of big and bulky to haul around if you do not have the car seat in there to begin with. But works great when you have the car seat in there and car seat stays clean and nice.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Moore

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two for both our kids car seats and this made traveling SO much easier! I would HIGHLY recommend this solution for traveling with your car seat. I wish I bought these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Cloud

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made, easy to maneuver and makes traveling with a child seat so much easier! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: rigs

customer_reviews.title: Easily tore with one use
customer_reviews.text: I loved how easy it was to put the car seat in it and that it had 4 wheels to pull with ease but after one trip home it tore at the bottom so not worth it to use one time I could of just as easily just used a trash bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Wished I had purchased sooner! Made navigating through airports a breeze. Which is a huge plus with our active boys!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you are not sure buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh this is amazing!! I have been through 4 bags prior to this one and I can’t believe I waited this long to buy this one !! Worth every penny !! My eight year old rolled it easily and it held up nicely with the padding inside. Nice sized
customer_reviews.author: jaimers

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It does say it fits Maxi Cosi Pria 85 and it does, but it’s a tight fit and hard to zip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Traveling with child hassle-free
customer_reviews.text: First time traveling with child seat and this travel bag made it so easy and hassle-free. Totally recomended. We’ve only used ut once and not even a scratch. We’ll keep you updated on the durability of this item. Loved it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Cristina Macias

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Just Get it! I research a lot before choosing this bag. Came perfectly packed and I can't wait to use it next week. I'll make sure to give an update.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for wheeling through the airport But had to remove at checkin since would not fit on conveyor belt to be scanned
customer_reviews.author: Tngal2

customer_reviews.title: Far superior to any other car seat travel bag we’ve ever ...
customer_reviews.text: Far superior to any other car seat travel bag we’ve ever purchased. Our giant car seat fit inside without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Michel2

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag not hard to use though putting seat is a two person job. But first use it tore at the seams on top of bag. They need to reinforce upper seams certain baggage handlers just grab anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Van Hecke

customer_reviews.title: A must have if you’re traveling by plane !
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have if you are traveling with a toddler, it made toting around a heavy car seat much easier ! It was so easy to put the car seat in and out of the bag and quality wheels very easy to push and maneuver in a busy airport!
customer_reviews.author: cierra karcher

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We use this all the time when traveling with the car seat. So easy to mobilize-- Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Must-Have for Travel with Big Car Seats
customer_reviews.text: This thing just saved my butt during Christmas travel. Worth every penny. Jury still out on whether or not the wheels will hold up—seem to be sticking a little but not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: PierceJL

customer_reviews.title: Useful but not durable
customer_reviews.text: Very useful bag and our Britax car seat fits very well. Unfortunately got damaged right at the first time we used. For this price we would expect more durability.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great purchase. Now I understand why it cost as much as a piece of luggage. It was so easy to wheel around. It fit my Chicco Fit2 and the base very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmín

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move
customer_reviews.text: So easy to navigate through the airport. I was able to easily pull this while steering a double stroller. I wish it had a separate pocket for diapers etc like my other one. But the ease of use completely makes up for that.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie R.

customer_reviews.title: Lacks quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I expect better quality. The zipper burst open already and I can see the stitching coming undone after one use. Gave it some stars because it did it’s job and the Graco 4ever fit
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for any Parent
customer_reviews.text: Very durable material. It has Plenty of room even with the car seat to throw in the some extra things you can’t fit into your luggage. That was a great plus for me. The wheels rolled smoothly and wasn’t a hassle to push.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Sad that it ripped on vacation but that’s airport handling for ya! But car seat was fine and came in handy for extra storage too!!
customer_reviews.author: NY Nana

customer_reviews.title: Bag ripped
customer_reviews.text: After one plane ride bag ripped open. We even checked it at the gate to prevent some damage. If it didn’t rip I would have loved the product (gave it all 5s), it rolls very nice and is easy to place car seat in.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Made travel easier
customer_reviews.text: Loved this cover! The convertible Britax car seat fit perfectly and the wheels rolled beautifully. On the return flight the zipper did open a bit but nothing to get upset about.
customer_reviews.author: Zany83

customer_reviews.title: Must have for traveling with baby
customer_reviews.text: This is life saving when it comes to travel with an infant (= a millions other luggages, bags, and your sanity). We got so many compliments from others too. It is smart and it is chic!
customer_reviews.author: Bui Diem Huong La

customer_reviews.title: Get one! You will be happy that you did.
customer_reviews.text: This was more useful than I had anticipated. I was extremely happy with its functionality....especially because I was doing all of the carrying of luggage. ;)
customer_reviews.author: mr_kix

customer_reviews.title: Back saver!
customer_reviews.text: Save your back, get this thing! Fits large convertible car seats with extra space. Buy two or invert a standard car seat bag and clip together to roll both. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made bringing the car seat much easier
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this purchase. It kept the car seat clean during travel but more importantly it made it much easier to lug it around during our trip
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Very good option to carry around easily
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly the Maxi Cosi Mico AP. It is very helpful and easy to carry around because of its wheels. It is made of a good enough material that could resist a transcontinental flight
customer_reviews.author: A. Mello

customer_reviews.title: Broke After Only One Use
customer_reviews.text: This product is very poorly made and ripped the first time we used it. The seam at the top of the bag split. I have included a picture to show the damage. While the concept is a good idea, the product was not produced to stand up to actual use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for traveling with kids!
customer_reviews.text: Airport lifesaver! Highly recommend and it certainly doubles as a mechanism to cart kids around.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Abboud

customer_reviews.title: and this one is the best. So easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Went through 2 car seat bags before I found this one, and this one is the best. So easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Helvin D Bacareza

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the higher price. Being able to wheel this through the airport (stuffed with a car seat, diapers, toys and extras for a long trip) was a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Beckermann

customer_reviews.title: Easypeasy
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these. We had to travel with two car seats and these travel bags made it much easier. They roll so easy. Don't know what we would have done without them.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne R.

customer_reviews.title: bad quality, not worth money
customer_reviews.text: after first use for travelling, it broken, the front piece teared,bad quality, not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler. D

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 car seats to haul through airports and the wheels make this much easier. The durability gives us peace that the car seat will survive the flight as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Great carrier, not a lot of protection but good enough.
customer_reviews.author: KRISHAN GAYAH

customer_reviews.title: Needed when traveling with a baby
customer_reviews.text: The best invention ever. Worth every penny and the wheels are so convienent.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie Guinovart

customer_reviews.title: Easy moving, enough space
customer_reviews.text: Easy to move and enough room so Available to pack stuffs on top of seat.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E Korte

customer_reviews.title: Great product to travel with!
customer_reviews.text: Was able to fit my graco extend2fit convertible! Super easy to put it in the bag and go!
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Made traveling easier. Pleanty of room to store diapers ...
customer_reviews.text: Made traveling easier. Pleanty of room to store diapers in as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good wheels
customer_reviews.text: Rolls much easier than others and plenty of extra room for coat. Protects good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pull and protected our car seat wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: The extra money for the wheels (over the backpack only style), is so worth it! Easy to pull and protected our car seat wonderfully. Highly recommend if you are traveling with a car seat!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Edwards

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I used for a Britax car seat.- it is perfect to keep safe & clean during trips
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Compatible w/ Clek 2018 Fllo
customer_reviews.text: Fits the 2018 Clek Fllo with the anti-rebound bar removed and placed ontop. So easy to roll!
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat carriers!  HUGE seats fit!
customer_reviews.text: These fit our Britax full size seats and they were EXTREMELY easy to maneuver. I would highly recommend these seat cover/carriers. It would be even better if there was a way to attach it to your luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Roopesh Sheth

customer_reviews.title: Best I've tried so far!
customer_reviews.text: Used this twice already for international travel. Has held up great and is super easy to roll around at the airport!
customer_reviews.author: Lkozovich

customer_reviews.title: Worth having!
customer_reviews.text: Used this with my nuna rava convertible car seat. It was perfect! I was traveling without my husband and could push my child in his stroller, handle my luggage and this bag! It also held up amazingly! Worth every penny! Oh there was also enough extra room I put a large pack of diapers in with the car seat, and a few other items!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine B

product_meta.title: J.L. Childress Spinner Wheelie Deluxe Car Seat Travel Bag, Black
product_meta.description: The J.L. Childress Spinner Wheelie Deluxe Car Seat Travel Bag combines complete protection for your car seat with the ultimate maneuverability of four spinner wheels. Use the Spinner Wheelie Deluxe to protect your child's car seat from damage, dirt, moisture and germs when checked as luggage, gate checked, on trains or aboard cruise ships. Four multi-directional spinner wheels provide 360-degree upright rolling. You can push or pull the bag in any direction without needing to tilt. The Spinner Wheelie Deluxe is constructed of durable, easy-clean 600D polyester fabric with PVC backing for strength and water-resistance. FULLY PADDED sides, top and back provide the highest level of protection for your valuable car seat. High-quality wheels with corner protection guard against wear and tear at critical contact points. A full-access front opening with high-quality dual, lockable zippers provides ease for moving car seat in and out of the bag. The bag features a solid and sturdy base with raised edges to help keep car seat in place while rolling, adding to ease of maneuverability. Additional features include a top carry handle and clear ID card pocket. The Spinner Wheelie Deluxe was designed to fit almost ALL brands and styles of convertible car seats, booster seats and infant car seats. TIP: When traveling with an infant car seat, detach the base and place it on top of the car seat inside the bag. Traveling with your child's car seat is now easier and more convenient than EVER before. Care instructions - Wipe clean with mild soap and warm water
feature_bullets: The first and only car seat travel bag with four 360-degree spinner wheels. Easy, multi-directional upright rolling without needing to tilt. Push or pull the bag in any direction
Fully padded on sides, top and back for deluxe protection of your valuable car seat

Airline Certified. Brought to you by J.L. Childress, the worldwide leading brand in universal car seat and stroller travel bags. From our family to yours, Travel Happy! #travelhappy #jlchildress #familytravel
Large opening - full access front opening with high-quality dual-zipper provides ease for loading car seat into bag. Adult use only

Fits almost all brands and styles of convertible car seats, boosters and infant seats. Does not fit Recaro Rally or Racer. When traveling with an infant car seat, detach the base and place it on top of the car seat inside the bag
Dual, lockable zipper opening ; Durable construction using water resistant and easy to clean materials

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars159 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
